page.title: 19A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: {This is a normal school day for a {secondary pupil. At 9:00 I go into my form room, then I have 1 hour 10 minutes of mathematics in which I am working on linear graphs. Then I have Craft for 1 hour 45 minutes. I have made a mobile in metal. Dinner is next (55 minutes), followed by French in which I learn some new words. Next is History - we are doing the Anglo-Saxons. In music we play the recorder, then I go to my form room for ten minutes while we are registered. At 3:30 I go home and get changed. I do my homework and, at 5:45, I have my tea. Later on I do more homework before going to band practice. I go to bed at 10:00.
